name: Hertha

titles.name: The Leader of Alastor Organization
titles.from: From her being the leader of the Alastor Organization after her father's death which give forward the rule of the Alastor Organization towards her as she is the first child of Alastor

titles.name: The Saviour of Many
titles.from: From her helping out the people who are sick and hungry through her generous donation which is done through the Alastor Organization

titles.name: The Lady of String
titles.from: This was given by anyone who truely know the lady herself, as her actions of manuplating and tricking people to like her, make her seem like a puppet master with strings. While everyone else is her puppet. She would like to believe that anyway as she sees everyone as simple toys play with to fulfill her wishes and dreams.

titles.name: The Holder of Jurisdiction
titles.from: She behold the rune of Jurisdiction which is a powerful rune that no one really knows the capibility of controling other people's will or mind. Although not much is known about it as she like to keep things hidden away from people.

fear_weakness.fear_weak: The fear of being seen as like another person in the world
fear_weakness.from: Because she does not like to be seen as another person, like a normal person who is unable to do anything. She prefer being seen by other people as she always live in the center stage and wish to stay it in forever.

fear_weakness.fear_weak: The fear of being unable to accomplish anything that is worthy
fear_weakness.from: In her entire life, she sees herself as perfect so it does make any sense why she would not able to win. She must win to make herself perfect like everytime before. No matter the cost

fear_weakness.fear_weak: Fear of being beaten by anyone, especially someone who she deem to be lower than her
fear_weakness.from: She hates the idea of someone to win over her. Even more if that person is seen as lower than her and not someone that she sees as a rival or some sort of pontentional rival which she can try to be beat. With her high self standard and being profen wrong about someone capability would only make her even more angrier.

motivation.motivation: To become a goddess, as reaching
motivation.from: Because God didn't give me oreo cookies when I ask it

motivation.motivation: To weave influence and control others like threads in a tapestry, shaping events to her design.
motivation.from: A deep belief that order and power must be maintained through subtle manipulation.
motivation.how: Through charm, persuasion, and carefully hidden schemes behind a mask of elegance.

appearance: She has long silvery-white hair tied back with a large ribbon, pale skin like porcelain, and sharp red-orange eyes that seem both alluring and unsettling. Dressed in a flowing black kimono adorned with gold embroidery, she carries herself with grace and authority, often holding a long pipe that trails with smoke. Her presence is elegant, commanding, and timeless, as though untouched by age.
notable_details: Often seen with her smoking pipe
Red-orange gaze that feels hypnotic or intimidating
Gold-embroidered kimono, suggesting wealth or mystical rank
A faint, knowing smile that implies hidden schemes
hobbies: Manipulating admirers or dream seeker for her own game
Telling her friends and companion how to play the system of manuplating other
Giving away gold and silvers towards donation for her own Alastor Organization
signature_object: Smoking devices like cigarettes or pipe
golden black or golden red Shan (扇)
signature_weapon: magical infuse hand which allow spell casting
previous_occupation: The Head of the Alastor Family
A member of the Intelligentsia Guild

family.name: Alastor
family.notes: The founder of the Alastor Organization

family.name: Elia Ravenstone
family.notes: Died during childbirth of her second child
You know the rule and so do I

affiliations.name: Adventurer's Guild
affiliations.notes: Adventurer's Guild is investigating her actions

notable_accomplishments: Helping several people with illness through the Alastor Organization
Acccepted as a part of a Intelligentsia Guild
Leading the Alastor Organization towards the path of science and magic, instend of just being a donation/charity organization
notable_quotes: If you wish for anyone to like you. You need to pretend, afterall no one like the truth~

quotes_from_others.quote: A woman who will truely make you believe that she is normal, but you can tell that she was never normal
quotes_from_others.author: Amelia Dayhearth

quotes_from_others.quote: the most beautiful woman that ever exist
quotes_from_others.author: George Verärgerung

personality_combat_style: Protective → Prioritizes defending allies over striking back.
